com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Interface OnMapRenderListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OnMapRenderListener.OnMapRenderListenerAdapter

    public interface OnMapRenderListener
    Represents an abstract class listener to provide notification upon completion of a Map rendering event.
    See Also:
    AndroidXMapFragment.addOnMapRenderListener(OnMapRenderListener), AndroidXMapFragment.removeOnMapRenderListener(OnMapRenderListener), MapView.addOnMapRenderListener(OnMapRenderListener), MapView.removeOnMapRenderListener(OnMapRenderListener)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  OnMapRenderListener.OnMapRenderListenerAdapter
      Default implementation for the OnMapRenderListener interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGraphicsDetached()
      Callback indicating that the map renderer has been cleanly detached from the view.
      void onPostDraw(boolean invalidated, long renderTime)
      Callback indicating that a Map drawing event has ended.
      void onPreDraw()
      Callback indicating that a Map drawing event is about to occur.
      void onRenderBufferCreated()
      Callback indicating that the map render buffer has been created.
      void onSizeChanged(int width, int height)
      Callback indicating that a Map size has changed following a rotation.

    • Method Detail

      • onPreDraw

        void onPreDraw()
        Callback indicating that a Map drawing event is about to occur. Applications can perform custom rendering when this callback is sent.

        This callback is preferred to OnMapRenderListener.onPostDraw(boolean, long) when making changes to MapObjects as the changes can be made during the upcoming draw and another Map invalidation will not need to take place.

        Note: This callback is made on the rendering thread.

      • onPostDraw

        void onPostDraw(boolean invalidated,
                long renderTime)
        Callback indicating that a Map drawing event has ended. Applications can perform custom rendering when this callback is sent.

        Note: This callback is made on the rendering thread.

        Parameters:
        invalidated - A boolean specifying whether the map is invalidated and will redraw
        renderTime - The time taken to render the map

      • onSizeChanged

        void onSizeChanged(int width,
                   int height)
        Callback indicating that a Map size has changed following a rotation. Applications can perform custom rendering when this callback is sent.

        Note: This callback is made on the UI thread.

        Parameters:
        width - A post-rotation width
        height - A post-rotation height

      • onGraphicsDetached

        void onGraphicsDetached()
        Callback indicating that the map renderer has been cleanly detached from the view.

      • onRenderBufferCreated

        void onRenderBufferCreated()
        Callback indicating that the map render buffer has been created.

        Note: This callback is made on the rendering thread.
